price: 125. Kuwase quluubta ka  buka41, waxay u kordhisaa fadaro42 (ka badan) fadaradoo- dii, waxayna dhintaan iyagoo gaalo ah.
arabic: وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٞ فَزَادَتۡهُمۡ رِجۡسًا إِلَىٰ رِجۡسِهِمۡ وَمَاتُواْ وَهُمۡ كَٰفِرُونَ
footnotes:
41. Jirrada qalbiga waxaa halkan loola jeedaa gaalnimada, nifaaqa, shakiga, kibirka, iwm.
42. Rijz luqad ahaan waa xumaan, fadaro, najaaso waxaana loola jeedaa gaalnimo iyo munaafiqnimo.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā alladhīna fī qulūbihim maraḍun fazādathum rij'san ilā rij'sihim wamātū wahum kāfirūna
